title: 211: Tayshia’s Bachelorette Recap: HOMETOWNS (And All Our Unpopular Opinions!)
itunes:title: 211: Tayshia’s Bachelorette Recap: HOMETOWNS (And All Our Unpopular Opinions!)
description:
In today’s episode The Broads discuss the “hometown" dates for Brendan, Zac, Ivan, and Ben! They chat about their continued love for Tayshia, which date was awkward, which date they loved, which date made them sweat, theories on who they believe will be Tayshia’s final pick, a whole lot of unpopular opinions, and much more!
